articles.title: AI technique accurately predicts deadly heart rhythms: Study - TheNewsMill
articles.description: In a Leicester study to see if artificial intelligence (AI) could identify whether a person was in danger of a deadly cardiac rhythm, an AI tool accurately detected the condition 80 per cent of the time.The study's findings, led by Dr Joseph Barker in collabo…

articles.title: Horizon Forbidden West PC Patch 1.0.43.0 Enables DLSS 3 Frame Generation in Cut Scenes, and More - Wccftech
articles.description: Nixxes has rolled out Horizon Forbidden West PC patch 1.0.43.0, enabling cutscene DLSS 3 Frame Generation, fixing bugs, and more.
articles.content:
Guerrilla Games and Nixxes have rolled out Horizon Forbidden West PC patch 1.0.43.0, enabling DLSS 3 Frame Generation in cutscenes, fixing bugs, and more.
The PC port of the Horizon Zero Dawn sequel… [+1981 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: NASA says three asteroids will pass Earth by a close margin today; Check speed, size and more - HT Tech
articles.description: As many as three asteroids are expected to fly past Earth by a close margin today, March 28. From size and speed to distance of approach, know all about these close encounters, as per NASA.
articles.content: Just yesterday, 3 asteroids passed Earth by a close margin. While none of them were considered Potentially Hazardous Asteroids, the biggest of them was 150 feet wide, making it almost as big as an ai… [+2809 chars]
